wobani.rendering.postprocessing

Class PostProcessingRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.rendering.Renderer
      • wobani.rendering.postprocessing.PostProcessingRenderer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FxaaRenderer, GammaCorrectionRenderer, GrayscaleRenderer, InvertRenderer, ReinhardToneMappingRenderer

    public abstract class PostProcessingRenderer
extends Renderer
    Abstract class for post processing renderers.
